Translations.Text: Ay$eo ur teppemsellakem
Xaii! Assa, nitni ad fken mayna
Ad zzin kra degsen, ar wiyav, pmesteqsayen
Ad inin: "ni$ kunwi teppasem d $uone$, s tgallit
A d inin: "xaii, ur tellim d lmumnin
Ur nesai kra udabu, fellawen. Xaii, tellam d agdud ijuoen
Iuao fella$ wawal n Mass nne$, aql a$, ih, la nessisin
Nes$eoq ikwen; nella, nekwni, d i$eooaqen
Ih, assen, nitni, deg uaaqeb ad dduklen
Akka, s tidep, ay Nxeddem i ibe$wviyen
Ih, nitni, mara asen inin: "ur illi oebbi siwa Oebbi", ssem$waoen iman nnsen
Qqaoen: "day a neoo ioebbiten nne$, ilmend umedyaz aoehbani
Xaii, iusa d s tidep, itebbet ed imazanen
Kunwi, war ccekk, a pjeooben aaaqeb aqeoean
A ppeppuqeiiim kan, af wayen txeddmem
kkes ed imdanen n Oebbi izedganen
I widak, l$it ipwassnen
lfakya; u nitni ad ppuauzzen
di leonanat isaadiyen
Mqabalen $ef imieoeen
Ad asen tezzin s lkas n waman ipfeggiven
D imellalen, d ieidanen i wid itessen
Ur qeooeen, ur helken
Â£uosen, sut wallen ibran
nitenti, am tmelli iffren
Ad zzin, kra $eo kra, pmesteqsayen
Yiwen id ihedoen, segsen, inna d: "illa $uoi umeddakwel
